honors_and_awards.title: National Runner Up | Accenture Innovation Challenge 2021
honors_and_awards.description: Finalist of the competition. Our team was one of the top 10 teams. Worked on an idea that helps college entrance exam aspirants find the perfect college. I was responsible for the complete product development and for hiring developers.
